data.message: You're not a God! There's only one God and you sure aren't him!

replies.message: where the unlike button, fk off you religious punk
lol kids always talk mess online like theyre tough get a life
and theres no unlike button because you cant deny Jesus is the only God. :)
As long as Eminem does not need a comment like this, it's a 'mess' too so you are not better than somebody calling you a fag. I won't do that ;)
^ I think you should learn to write.. your comment made no sense whatsoever..

This is just f*cked up man.
You are not using any Capital letters and nothing you've written sounds right but you are correcting me… nice ego. If there is a God, he for sure regrets giving you the ability to think because you don't use it. You can learn to write correctly. Just look up! 'shuld'?

Where you're wrong is I do know how to use correct punctuation, spelling and capitalization. Not only that but because God does exist, God gave me the ability think which is why I know how to go back to what I have written and able to correct my mistakes. I went to school so I don't need to go back to learn to spell but thanks for the thought.
"lol kids always talk mess online like theyre tough get a life"
you do realize you are also talking shit right?
No, i am defending God and trying to help him save some time from defending a singer so strongly just because he doesn't share the same beliefs as me.
there is no god but there a eminem

you sir are an idiot. god doesnt exist. and plus, chill. im sure em wasnt saying he was 'god' but just intending hes the god of rap. dont go getting your panties in a bunch on such a retarded argument. just keep your religious comments (which dont even make sense) to your damn self.
He says, "RAP God", as in God of rap music. Not just "God" as in the religious figure.

ok enough is enough are yall retarded? you think i dont know what hes implying? See unfortunately whether he wants to imply hes just the God of rap it doesnt matter. Hes not a God period. God is creater and God of everything.
em is illuminati , he can´t get out
Hes a rap God...bitch!!
Van MercadoThis is an actual quote from the bible idiot "Be imitators of me, as I am of Christ." Corinthians
and he is saying god in the general sense retard not actual "God"

before you ask yes i am christian.Eminem is saying he is the rap god meaning the highest of the high in RAP, not everything.You know why i hate people like you.You drag religion into everything and try to be a smart ass
Keep your religious BS of the internet. By the way, eminem  is a god
Off*
